turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I order a coffee from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have an iced caramel latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. would you like any whipped cream as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so just to confirm, it's a grande iced caramel latte with skim milk and whipped cream. is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. which store would you like to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Danforth location in Edmond, Oklahoma.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say the starbucks at danforth?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, your coffee will be ready to be picked up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. you will receive a text message with your receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye!
